answers.answer: Hi,Actos  or pioglitazone is an oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels. It may increase the risk of developing bladder cancer or heart problem. It is best that she talks with her doctor about her  specific risk. There are many factors to consider such as medical history, symptoms present as well as results of diagnostic tests. Take care and best regards.

question: Can actos&actos+metiforin cause bladder cancer taken by a woman in her early 20's and make it hard to stabilize her blood sugar with insulin .
title: actos wonder
